mapper.select: select su.user_id "userId", su.user_name "userName", su.password "password", su.icon "iconUrl", su.employee_id "employeeId", su.enable_flag "enableFlag" from sys_user su where su.user_name = #{UserName}

select c.role_id "roleId", c.role_name "roleName", c.role_code "roleCode", c.enable_flag "enableFlag" from sys_user a, sys_user_roles b, sys_roles c where a.user_name = #{UserName} and b.user_id = a.user_id and b.role_id = c.role_id
